pullrequest.title: Node.hh: don't dereference _cb when it isn't a pointer

content.raw:
I believe this was causing ign-gui compilation to fail:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/84/console
* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/src/f5d4835cb0d475fc4cdf3148c978670d5fa85029/src/plugins/TimePanel_TEST.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#TimePanel_TEST.cc-120:129
